name: Pika Hayes
learned: I am a high school student visiting Detroit for a summer internship at Beverages and Snacks Store. I enjoy learning about technology and cars.
currently: I am working on a project to improve the user interface of the Beverages and Snacks Store platform.
lifestyle: I go to bed around 23:00, wake up around 07:00, eat dinner around 19:00
